body_html: Can we reopen the issue for implementing the 'feed_previous' feature in basic_rnn_seq2seq? This is useful for time series predictions. Otherwise we will need to implement our own seq2seq using lstm from scratch which may not be as optimised I think

body: Can we reopen the issue for implementing the 'feed_previous' feature in basic_rnn_seq2seq? This is useful for time series predictions. Otherwise we will need to implement our own seq2seq using lstm from scratch which may not be as optimised I think
